mahini || 
stOmA#sastvA vicAriNiq prati#ShTOBantyaqktuBi#H | 
prayA vAjaqM na hESha#ntaM pEqrumasya#syarjuni || 
RuqdUqdarE#Naq saKyA# sacEyaq yO mAq na riShyE$ddharyaSva pIqtaH | 
aqyaM ~MyaH sOmOq nyadhA$yyaqsmE tasmAq indra#M praqtira#mEqmyacCa# || 
ApA$ntamanyustRuqpala#-praBarmAq dhuniqH SimI# vAq~jCaru#mA(gm) RujIqShI | 
sOmOq viSvA$nyataqsA vanA#niq nArvAgindra#M pratiqmAnA#ni dEBuH || 
pra - [  ]  66
